name: probtrackx
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Streamlines tracking algorithm for probabilistic tractography

inputs.description: Basename for samples files
inputs.name: Samples file basename

inputs.description: Bet binary mask file in diffusion space
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Seed volume, or voxel, or ascii file with multiple volumes, or freesurfer label file
inputs.name: Seed file

inputs.description: Output file (default='fdt_paths')
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Verbose level, [0-2]
inputs.name: Verbose level

inputs.description: File containing a list of target masks - required for seeds_to_targets classification
inputs.name: Target masks list file

inputs.description: Second mask in twomask_symm mode.
inputs.name: Second mask file

inputs.description: Waypoint mask or ascii list of waypoint masks - only keep paths going through ALL the masks
inputs.name: Waypoints mask file

inputs.description: Activate network mode - only keep paths going through at least one seed mask (required if multiple seed masks)
inputs.name: Network mode flag

inputs.description: Freesurfer-type surface descriptor (in ascii format)
inputs.name: Mesh descriptor file

inputs.description: Reference vol to define seed space in simple mode - diffusion space assumed if absent
inputs.name: Seed reference volume

inputs.description: Directory to put the final volumes in - code makes this directory - default='logdir'
inputs.name: Output directory

inputs.description: Use the actual directory name given - i.e. don't add + to make a new directory
inputs.name: Force directory name flag

inputs.description: Output path distribution
inputs.name: Output path distribution flag

inputs.description: Correct path distribution for the length of the pathways
inputs.name: Correct path distribution flag

inputs.description: Output seeds to targets
inputs.name: Output seeds to targets flag

inputs.description: Reject pathways passing through locations given by this mask
inputs.name: Avoid mask file

inputs.description: Stop tracking at locations given by this mask file
inputs.name: Stop mask file

inputs.description: Transform taking seed space to DTI space (either FLIRT matrix or FNIRT warpfield) - default is identity
inputs.name: Seed-to-DTI transform

inputs.description: Transform taking DTI space to seed space (compulsory when using a warpfield for seeds_to_dti)
inputs.name: DTI-to-seed transform

inputs.description: Number of samples - default=5000
inputs.name: Number of samples

inputs.description: Number of steps per sample - default=2000
inputs.name: Number of steps per sample

inputs.description: Discards samples shorter than this threshold (in mm - default=0)
inputs.name: Distance threshold

inputs.description: Curvature threshold - default=0.2
inputs.name: Curvature threshold

inputs.description: Volume fraction before subsidary fibre orientations are considered - default=0.01
inputs.name: Fibre volume fraction threshold

inputs.description: Sample random points within seed voxels
inputs.name: Sample voxels flag

inputs.description: Steplength in mm - default=0.5
inputs.name: Step length

inputs.description: Perform loopchecks on paths - slower, but allows lower curvature threshold
inputs.name: Loop check flag

inputs.description: Use anisotropy to constrain tracking
inputs.name: Use anisotropy flag

inputs.description: Default 0. Set to 1 to randomly sample initial fibres (with f > fibthresh). Set to 2 to sample in proportion fibres (with f>fibthresh) to f. Set to 3 to sample ALL populations at random (even if f<fibthresh)
inputs.name: Random fibres sampling mode

inputs.description: Force a starting fibre for tracking - default=1, i.e. first fibre orientation. Only works if randfib==0
inputs.name: Starting fibre

inputs.description: Use modified euler streamlining
inputs.name: Modified euler streamlining flag

inputs.description: Random seed
inputs.name: Random seed

inputs.description: Output seed-to-target counts as a text file (useful when seeding from a mesh)
inputs.name: Seed-to-target text output flag

groups.description: Optional miscellaneous parameters when running probtrackx
groups.name: Compulsory Arguments Group
